<p>The Ministry immediately began to deny Dumbledore and Harry's claims that the Dark Lord had returned, starting a smear campaign designed to slander and vilify them; in particular, Dumbledore was removed from his positions as <a href="/wiki/Chief_Warlock" title="Chief Warlock">Chief Warlock</a> of the <a href="/wiki/Wizengamot" title="Wizengamot">Wizengamot</a> and <a href="/wiki/Supreme_Mugwump" title="Supreme Mugwump">Supreme Mugwump</a> of the <a href="/wiki/International_Confederation_of_Wizards" title="International Confederation of Wizards">International Confederation of Wizards</a> as punishment for his refusal to stay in line with Ministry propaganda. However, Dumbledore professed not to care, so long as the Ministry did not eliminate him from <a href="/wiki/Chocolate_Frog_Card" title="Chocolate Frog Card">Chocolate Frog Cards</a>. He confessed that he believed that Fudge's persecution of him was of his own free will and not due to the <a href="/wiki/Imperius_Curse" title="Imperius Curse">Imperius Curse</a>, though this was small comfort.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_64-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-64"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>64<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Before the beginning of the school year, Dumbledore was made <a href="/wiki/Secret_Keeper" title="Secret Keeper">Secret-Keeper</a> of the headquarters of the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a> and ensured that Harry Potter's friends did not divulge any information about the Order to him, as he did not want the Order to be compromised in anyway.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_64-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-64"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>64<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Dumbledore attended Harry's trial at the Ministry, arriving three hours early at five a.m. by a handy mistake. He presented <a href="/wiki/Arabella_Figg" title="Arabella Figg">Arabella Figg</a> for Harry's defence and offered to call <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> to testify that Harry had not used a Hover Charm in 1992 and reminded Fudge that he himself had pardoned Harry's accidental inflation of <a href="/wiki/Marjorie_Dursley" title="Marjorie Dursley">Marjorie Dursley</a>. He also commented on the unusual behaviour of the court holding a full criminal hearing for a simple case of underage magic. After the Wizengamot had ruled in Harry's favour, Dumbledore left without having so much as spoken to Harry or looked at him.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_64-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-64"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>64<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>When the time came to choose the <a href="/wiki/Prefect" title="Prefect">Prefects</a> from the fifth-years, Dumbledore considered Harry, but out of sympathy for the ordeals he had faced and the ones still to come, he chose to spare him the added responsibility and passed it on to <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a>. This decision confused some people who had assumed Harry would naturally receive it and would have shown solidarity with the young wizard.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_64-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-64"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>64<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Umbridge_speech.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160609132202" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Umbridge speech" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="109" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Umbridge speech.jpg" data-image-key="Umbridge_speech.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Umbridge_speech.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160609132202" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Umbridge_speech.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160609132202" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Umbridge speech" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Umbridge_speech.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160609132202" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="109" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Umbridge speech.jpg" data-image-key="Umbridge_speech.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Umbridge_speech.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160609132202" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Umbridge_speech.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a>, the new DADA professor interrupting Dumbledore</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Dumbledore had come to fear the connection that existed between the Dark Lord and Harry, and purposely avoided him throughout the school year. When signs of this connection became increasingly obvious, Dumbledore had <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> attempt to teach Harry the art of <a href="/wiki/Occlumency" title="Occlumency">Occlumency</a>, rather than himself, as he feared that Voldemort may have been able to peer into his mind through his connection to Harry. The Ministry also began to interfere heavily at Hogwarts. They appointed Fudge's Senior Undersecretary (Dolores Umbridge) to the post of <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> professor.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_64-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-64"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>64<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Umbridge started her reign at Hogwarts by rudely interrupting Dumbledore's Start-of-Term Feast. Things got progressively worse from there. Umbridge and Fudge slowly passed rules and regulations that syphoned the powers of the Headmaster, while increasing those of Umbridge herself. Until finally Umbridge was granted the new position of <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_High_Inquisitor" title="Hogwarts High Inquisitor">High Inquisitor</a> of Hogwarts. In response to Umbridge and the Ministry's refusal to teach practical defensive magic, Harry Potter, <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a>, and Ron Weasley created a group of students that met secretly to learn defence against the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Arts" title="Dark Arts">Dark Arts</a>. With Harry acting as the leader and teacher, this organisation was known as Dumbledore's Army, in order to frighten the Ministry.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_64-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-64"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>64<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/B5C27M3_Dumbledore%27s_escape.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180423215252" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B5C27M3 Dumbledore's escape" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B5C27M3 Dumbledore's escape.jpg" data-image-key="B5C27M3_Dumbledore%27s_escape.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/B5C27M3_Dumbledore%27s_escape.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180423215252" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/B5C27M3_Dumbledore%27s_escape.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180423215252" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B5C27M3 Dumbledore's escape" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/B5C27M3_Dumbledore%27s_escape.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180423215252" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B5C27M3 Dumbledore's escape.jpg" data-image-key="B5C27M3_Dumbledore%27s_escape.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/B5C27M3_Dumbledore%27s_escape.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180423215252" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B5C27M3_Dumbledore%27s_escape.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Dumbledore escaping the Ministry workers: Fudge, Umbridge, Dawlish and Shacklebolt</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When this illegal society was uncovered, Dumbledore willingly took the blame; pointing out that it was named "<i><a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore's Army">Dumbledore's Army</a>, not Potter's Army.</i>" While Fudge ordered his arrest, Dumbledore stated that he would not come quietly and easily overpowered his would-be captors with a single spell and went underground, working to aid the Order full-time. In Dumbledore's stead, Umbridge was named Headmistress of <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a> and took full advantage of her position and authority over students and staff alike.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_64-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-64"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>64<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Duel_with_Lord_Voldemort">Duel with Lord Voldemort</span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article: <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix"><b>Albus Dumbledore</b>: "<i>It was foolish to come here tonight, Tom. The Aurors are on their way —</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Voldemort</b>: "<i>By which time I shall be gone, and you dead!</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Dumbledore and Voldemort preparing to duel<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>Unfortunately, as Dumbledore had feared, Voldemort finally acted to use the connection between himself and Harry Potter. Using <a href="/wiki/Legilimency" title="Legilimency">Legilimency</a>, Voldemort created a vision that indicated that his beloved godfather, Sirius Black, had been captured by Voldemort personally and was being tortured by him within the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Mysteries" title="Department of Mysteries">Department of Mysteries</a>. Harry, Ron, Hermione, <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a>, <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> all rushed to the Ministry in the hopes of saving Sirius. However, the six students were ambushed by a group of Death Eaters, who hoped to force Harry to recover the record of the prophecy made about him and the Dark Lord. Voldemort perceived that it was too dangerous to enter the heart of the Ministry of Magic himself. Fortunately, Severus Snape was able to alert the Order to this and several members arrived in the Ministry where they battled with the Death Eaters.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_64-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-64"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>64<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d1/Dumbledore_and_Voldemort_duel.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190324225454" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Dumbledore and Voldemort duel" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="141" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Dumbledore and Voldemort duel.gif" data-image-key="Dumbledore_and_Voldemort_duel.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d1/Dumbledore_and_Voldemort_duel.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190324225454" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d1/Dumbledore_and_Voldemort_duel.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190324225454" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Dumbledore and Voldemort duel" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d1/Dumbledore_and_Voldemort_duel.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190324225454" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="141" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Dumbledore and Voldemort duel.gif" data-image-key="Dumbledore_and_Voldemort_duel.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d1/Dumbledore_and_Voldemort_duel.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190324225454" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Dumbledore_and_Voldemort_duel.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Dumbledore duelling Voldemort</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Near the end of the battle, Dumbledore himself arrived and swiftly captured all the Death Eaters personally; except <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a>, who murdered Sirius and evaded a spell cast at her by the revered wizard. After binding the Death Eaters with an <a href="/wiki/Anti-Disapparition_Jinx" title="Anti-Disapparition Jinx">Anti-Disapparition Jinx</a>, Dumbledore went to the atrium of the Ministry where Lestrange had been joined by Voldemort himself, who attempted to kill Harry.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_64-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-64"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>64<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Voldemort's curse, however, was prevented; Dumbledore quickly animated a golden statue to cover Harry and shield him from the curse. He <a href="/wiki/Piertotum_Locomotor" class="mw-redirect" title="Piertotum Locomotor">animated</a> the other statues from the <a href="/wiki/Fountain_of_Magical_Brethren" title="Fountain of Magical Brethren">Fountain of Magical Brethren</a> to immobilise Bellatrix and alert Ministry officials. With Voldemort having arrived in the Ministry, Dumbledore took this chance to give undeniable evidence that the Dark Lord truly had returned and fought him both to protect Harry and hold him at bay. Dumbledore displayed his extraordinary magical capabilities as he calmly countered or dodged Voldemort's attacks and returned with his own assault that steadily forced Voldemort to go on the defensive, yet Dumbledore was not fighting to kill, a fact which surprised Voldemort. Soon enough, Dumbledore managed to trap the Dark Lord within an <a href="/wiki/Orb_of_Water" title="Orb of Water">Orb of Water</a> just after having been saved by Fawkes, who intercepted a killing curse Voldemort had shot at Dumbledore while the latter was countering the strike of a fiery serpent that Voldemort had conjured. Though Dumbledore had failed to capture or defeat Voldemort, the Dark Lord realised himself that he could not overpower his former teacher, and so abandoned his effort and disapparated.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_64-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-64"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>64<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>

href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d0/Dumbledore_talking_with_Harry_in_his_office_OOTPF.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170718223647" class="mw-file-description image"><img <p>Before Voldemort fled the Ministry however, he briefly possessed Harry, hoping that Dumbledore would sacrifice the teenager in an attempt to kill him. However, Dumbledore did not take the bait as he cared for Harry too much to do it. Fortunately, Dumbledore did not have to resort to whatever means he would've needed to remove Voldemort from Harry himself, as the tremendous power of Harry's love, dwelt on his grief for his late godfather, inflicted great pain upon Voldemort and the Dark Lord was forced to remove himself and block his connection. With his failure to retrieve the prophecy and his attempt on Harry's life foiled, Voldemort fled the Ministry with Bellatrix, but not before he was seen by Ministry officials, including Minister for Magic <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a>. With Dumbledore's credibility realised once more, Fudge's was permanently lost. Henceforth, Dumbledore successfully ensured that Fudge removed Umbridge, pardoned Hagrid so he could return to Hogwarts and he himself would be reinstated as headmaster.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_64-15" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-64"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>64<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Once he was back at Hogwarts, Dumbledore consulted with a distraught Harry. After all the stress and pain that was put on the fifteen-year-old's shoulders for an entire year, coupled with the loss of his godfather, Harry finally snapped and began destroying Dumbledore's possessions in an incredible rage. However Dumbledore calmly levelled with the boy, freely admitting that Harry had every right to be angry with him, and if anything he should have been far angrier at him. He acknowledged that Sirius's death was his fault, and that if Harry let him explain, the boy would be free to rage and storm at him, even attack him if he chose to. Managing to appease Harry, he began explaining the meaning of his connection with Voldemort and asserting the meaning of the prophecy. Before the end of the year, he also had the <a href="/wiki/Inquisitorial_Squad" title="Inquisitorial Squad">Inquisitorial Squad</a> disbanded and reverted any damage they did.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_64-16" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-64"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>64<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Training_Harry_Potter">Training Harry Potter</span></h4>

<div class="quote">

<dd>— Dumbledore having witnessed the memory of <a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Horace Slughorn</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>

<p>During the summer of 1996, Dumbledore tracked one of Voldemort's Horcruxes to the house of the <a href="/wiki/House_of_Gaunt" title="House of Gaunt">Gaunts</a>. Dumbledore journeyed to <a href="/wiki/Little_Hangleton" title="Little Hangleton">Little Hangleton</a>, where he found the remains of the shack hidden behind weeds and bush. Voldemort had placed many powerful enchantments around the former home of his ancestors; however, Dumbledore proved skilful enough to pass through them unharmed. When he found the Horcrux, a ring formerly owned by <a href="/wiki/Marvolo_Gaunt" title="Marvolo Gaunt">Marvolo Gaunt</a>, he saw that the stone in the ring was one of the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Resurrection_Stone" title="Resurrection Stone">Resurrection Stone</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_48-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>This stone, according to legend, had the power to revive the dead (but in reality, a spiritual form of the person was brought back instead, much like an echo). His desire to see his family overrode his common sense for just a moment and he placed the ring on his finger, forgetting that the ring had been cursed by Voldemort. The curse quickly spread, and were it not for his own prodigious talents, he would have died within moments. Despite this injury, Dumbledore proceeded to destroy the ring, and with it, a piece of Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Soul" title="Soul">soul</a>, bringing Voldemort that much closer to defeat.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_48-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>

<p>Dumbledore quickly returned to <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>, where the skills of <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> managed to trap the curse in Dumbledore's hand. However, both Snape and Dumbledore knew that it would eventually spread to the rest of his body. Knowing that the curse would kill him, Dumbledore asked Snape, that when the time came, that he be the one to end Dumbledore's life, rather than <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>. Malfoy had been given the task of <a href="/wiki/Plot_to_assassinate_Albus_Dumbledore" title="Plot to assassinate Albus Dumbledore">assassinating the headmaster</a>; in order to spare Draco's <a href="/wiki/Soul" title="Soul">soul</a> from being torn, Snape had to be the one to carry it out. Snape later objected to the plan but was reminded by Dumbledore that it was the only way to spare him from great suffering. During this time, Dumbledore also shared his insights on Voldemort with Harry by showing him the various memories he had collected, giving Harry a greater knowledge of Voldemort's psychology that would help him in his future conflicts.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_48-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>

<p>Throughout the 1996–1997 school year, Dumbledore passed on certain pieces of information to <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> that would be important for the boy in his quest to destroy the Dark Lord. Dumbledore held private lessons with Harry, revealing in them much of what he had learnt about Voldemort's past, life and <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>. Dumbledore revealed to Harry that he made it his business to try and find out about <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>'s past. He did this by questioning people who had known him as a child and a teenager and obtained Voldemort-related memories from them.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_48-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>He collected memories from <a href="/wiki/Bob_Ogden" title="Bob Ogden">Bob Ogden</a>, <a href="/wiki/Morfin_Gaunt" title="Morfin Gaunt">Morfin Gaunt</a>, Horace Slughorn, and the house-elf Hokey. Using these memories, along with some of his own, he discovered that Voldemort had created six Horcruxes, an unheard-of event, been guilty of murders that he framed others for, and also figured out what the Horcruxes could be based on Voldemort's ego and his long interest in Hogwarts: <a href="/wiki/T._M._Riddle%27s_Diary" title="T. M. Riddle's Diary">Tom Riddle's Diary</a>, <a href="/wiki/Marvolo_Gaunt%27s_Ring" title="Marvolo Gaunt's Ring">Gaunt's Ring</a>, <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff%27s_Cup" title="Hufflepuff's Cup">Hufflepuff's Cup</a>, <a href="/wiki/Slytherin%27s_Locket" title="Slytherin's Locket">Slytherin's Locket</a>, <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>, and an object of <a href="/wiki/Rowena_Ravenclaw" title="Rowena Ravenclaw">Rowena Ravenclaw</a>'s (later revealed to be her lost <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw%27s_Diadem" title="Ravenclaw's Diadem">diadem</a>). They dismissed the idea of a Gryffindor artefact as unlikely as only the Sorting Hat and the <a href="/wiki/Sword_of_Gryffindor" title="Sword of Gryffindor">Sword of Gryffindor</a> remained as items from Gryffindor himself and Voldemort did not have access to them.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_48-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Hunting_for_Horcruxes">Hunting for Horcruxes</span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article: <a href="/wiki/Second_skirmish_at_the_Cave" class="mw-redirect" title="Second skirmish at the Cave">Second skirmish at the Cave</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>I would like you to wear your Cloak, please. Very good. Shall we go?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Dumbledore to Harry, before their journey to the cave<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>

<p>After much searching, Dumbledore eventually tracked another of Voldemort's Horcruxes to a cave that as a young orphan, he had once visited. As he had promised, Dumbledore allowed Harry Potter to accompany him to the cave and help destroy the Horcrux. Setting off from Hogwarts on an evening in late June 1997,<sup id="cite_ref-deathdate_6-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-deathdate-6"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>6<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> he and Harry <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Apparated</a> to just outside the cave, being unable to enter directly due to its protective enchantments. Once inside, Dumbledore located the Horcrux's second line of defence; a hidden doorway which only opened when it received an offering of blood.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_48-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>They next found themselves in a vast chamber containing an underground lake, with a solitary island at its centre from which a faint green light was visible. After a failed attempt by Harry at <a href="/wiki/Summoning_Charm" title="Summoning Charm">Summoning</a> the Horcrux, Dumbledore located a carefully concealed boat that would allow them safe passage across the lake. During the crossing, Harry learned of the Horcrux's third line of defence; the lake was filled with <a href="/wiki/Inferius" title="Inferius">Inferi</a>, which would attack anyone who touched the lake's water. Dumbledore instructed Harry on the use of fire as the weapon of choice against the Inferi, should it become necessary.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_48-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Arriving at the small island, they found a basin filled with <a href="/wiki/Emerald_Potion" title="Emerald Potion">glowing green potion</a>. This last defence could not be removed by <a href="/wiki/Vanishing_Spell" title="Vanishing Spell">Vanishing</a> it or scooping it out; someone would have to drink it to get to the Horcrux that lay within. Dumbledore ordered Harry to help him drink all of the potion, no matter what effects it caused, even if Harry had to force it down Dumbledore's throat.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_48-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/62/Albus_Dumbledore_to_drink_Emerald_Potion.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140813154241" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Albus Dumbledore to drink Emerald Potion" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="113" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Albus Dumbledore to drink Emerald Potion.jpg" data-image-key="Albus_Dumbledore_to_drink_Emerald_Potion.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/62/Albus_Dumbledore_to_drink_Emerald_Potion.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20140813154241" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/62/Albus_Dumbledore_to_drink_Emerald_Potion.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140813154241" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Albus Dumbledore to drink Emerald Potion" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/62/Albus_Dumbledore_to_drink_Emerald_Potion.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20140813154241" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="113" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Albus Dumbledore to drink Emerald Potion.jpg" data-image-key="Albus_Dumbledore_to_drink_Emerald_Potion.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/62/Albus_Dumbledore_to_drink_Emerald_Potion.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20140813154241" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Albus_Dumbledore_to_drink_Emerald_Potion.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Dumbledore preparing to drink the <a href="/wiki/Emerald_Potion" title="Emerald Potion">Emerald Potion</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Dumbledore drank and he saw a vision of the duel between him, <a href="/wiki/Gellert_Grindelwald" title="Gellert Grindelwald">Gellert Grindelwald</a> and <a href="/wiki/Aberforth_Dumbledore" title="Aberforth Dumbledore">Aberforth Dumbledore</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ariana_Dumbledore" title="Ariana Dumbledore">Ariana</a>'s death. The drink also was weakening him and made him extremely thirsty as well and caused him great pain (the whole purpose of the potion). He couldn't bear it, but Harry succeeded at getting it down his throat by telling him it would be over soon. On his last drink he fell unconscious. After a failed attempt by Harry to revive him with <a href="/wiki/Reviving_Spell" title="Reviving Spell">Rennervate</a>, Dumbledore woke up after his period of unconsciousness wanting water.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_48-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b2/Dumbledore-fire.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20080810070750" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Dumbledore-fire" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Dumbledore-fire.JPG" data-image-key="Dumbledore-fire.JPG" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b2/Dumbledore-fire.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20080810070750" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b2/Dumbledore-fire.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20080810070750" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Dumbledore-fire" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b2/Dumbledore-fire.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20080810070750" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Dumbledore-fire.JPG" data-image-key="Dumbledore-fire.JPG" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b2/Dumbledore-fire.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20080810070750" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Dumbledore-fire.JPG" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Albus creating a fire storm to ward off the attacking Inferi</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry then attempted to summon water for Dumbledore with the <a href="/wiki/Water-Making_Spell" title="Water-Making Spell">Water-Making Spell</a>, but this proved ineffective as the cavern was enchanted to <a href="/wiki/Vanishing_Spell" title="Vanishing Spell">vanish</a> summoned water. In desperation, Harry filled a cup with water from the lake. Harry was only able to tip the water over Dumbledore's face before the Inferi climbed up out of the lake and attacked them. Harry panicked and attempted to fight back with a multitude of spells and curses, including the <a href="/wiki/Impediment_Jinx" title="Impediment Jinx">Impediment Jinx</a> and <i><a href="/wiki/Laceration_Curse" title="Laceration Curse">Sectumsempra</a></i> <a href="/wiki/Curse" title="Curse">curse</a>, but none of them worked since the Inferi were too numerous and had no blood to spill. Dumbledore, having regained consciousness, <a href="/wiki/Firestorm" title="Firestorm">created a ring of fire</a> around them that repelled the Inferi, driving them back into the lake while he and Harry escaped in the boat with the Horcrux. Harry used a small cut on his arm to reopen the hidden doorway, and once outside the cave they <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Disapparated</a> back to <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_48-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Battle_of_the_Astronomy_Tower">Battle of the Astronomy Tower</span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article: <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Astronomy_Tower" title="Battle of the Astronomy Tower">Battle of the Astronomy Tower</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>A jet of green light shot from the end of Snape's wand and hit Dumbledore squarely in the chest. Harry's scream of horror never left him; silent and unmoving, he was forced to watch as Dumbledore was blasted into the air: for a split second he seemed to hang suspended beneath the shining skull, and then he fell slowly backwards, like a great rag doll, over the battlements and out of sight.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Description of Dumbledore's death<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>They would find no rest there, however, as the Battle of the Astronomy Tower had already begun. Harry and Dumbledore took brooms from behind <a href="/wiki/Rosmerta" title="Rosmerta">Madam Rosmerta</a>'s bar and flew to the Astronomy Tower. Once at the <a href="/wiki/Astronomy_Tower" title="Astronomy Tower">Astronomy Tower</a>, Dumbledore and an invisibility-cloaked Harry were confronted by <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>. Before Harry could reveal himself, Dumbledore immobilised him with a silent <a href="/wiki/Full_Body-Bind_Curse" title="Full Body-Bind Curse">Full Body-Bind Curse</a>, making it so he could only watch the upcoming event.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_48-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Draco_disarms_dumbledore.gif/revision/latest?cb=20161007223528" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Draco disarms dumbledore" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="111" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Draco disarms dumbledore.gif" data-image-key="Draco_disarms_dumbledore.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Draco_disarms_dumbledore.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161007223528" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Draco_disarms_dumbledore.gif/revision/latest?cb=20161007223528" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Draco disarms dumbledore" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Draco_disarms_dumbledore.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161007223528" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="111" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Draco disarms dumbledore.gif" data-image-key="Draco_disarms_dumbledore.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Draco_disarms_dumbledore.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161007223528" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Draco_disarms_dumbledore.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Dumbledore being disarmed by Malfoy</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Malfoy disarmed Dumbledore, and admitted that he, Draco, was behind the series of attacks on Hogwarts students, and that Voldemort had ordered him to kill Dumbledore. Dumbledore revealed that he knew of Draco's mission and of the attempts on his life with the <a href="/wiki/Opal_Necklace" title="Opal Necklace">Opal Necklace</a> and poisoned mead but allowed him to remain in Hogwarts for knowing Voldemort would kill him if he was exposed and expelled. Dumbledore offered Draco protection, and promised to hide Draco and his mother where Voldemort would never find them. Draco ultimately could not bring himself to kill the Headmaster, even after the arrival and encouragement of several Death Eaters, who were smuggled into the castle by Draco.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_48-15" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a7/Dumbledore_dies.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140813154818" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Dumbledore dies" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="150" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Dumbledore dies.gif" data-image-key="Dumbledore_dies.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a7/Dumbledore_dies.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140813154818" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a7/Dumbledore_dies.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140813154818" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Dumbledore dies" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a7/Dumbledore_dies.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140813154818" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="150" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Dumbledore dies.gif" data-image-key="Dumbledore_dies.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a7/Dumbledore_dies.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140813154818" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Dumbledore_dies.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Dumbledore's <a href="/wiki/Death" title="Death">death</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>However, Snape — who had been called by <a href="/wiki/Filius_Flitwick" title="Filius Flitwick">Filius Flitwick</a> to assist the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a>, sometime previously — arrived at the Tower and, after Dumbledore pleaded with him, in a way that did not expose Snape's true intentions, <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">killed</a> the Headmaster, blasting his body off the tower and falling to the ground below.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_48-16" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">"<i>After all, to the well-organised mind, death is but the next great adventure.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Albus Dumbledore regarding the afterlife<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/70/B6C28_Harry_and_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest?cb=20241205224050" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B6C28 Harry and Dumbledore" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="133" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B6C28 Harry and Dumbledore.png" data-image-key="B6C28_Harry_and_Dumbledore.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/70/B6C28_Harry_and_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241205224050" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/70/B6C28_Harry_and_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest?cb=20241205224050" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B6C28 Harry and Dumbledore" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/70/B6C28_Harry_and_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241205224050" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="133" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B6C28 Harry and Dumbledore.png" data-image-key="B6C28_Harry_and_Dumbledore.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/70/B6C28_Harry_and_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241205224050" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B6C28_Harry_and_Dumbledore.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry kneeling over Dumbledore's body</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>A while later after the battle was over, Harry found Dumbledore's body lying dead on the ground in front of hundreds of staring people, his body broken from the fall. Harry found the locket and read a letter written by <a href="/wiki/Regulus_Black" title="Regulus Black">R.A.B.</a> and realised that it was not a Horcrux, meaning the locket was a fake. Harry neither knew nor cared what this message meant, and he felt that he and Dumbledore had accomplished nothing that night and that the latter had weakened himself by drinking the potion for nothing. Harry started crying over Dumbledore's corpse as well as straightening his half-moon spectacles upon his crooked nose and Harry wiping a trickle of blood from the dead Headmaster's mouth with his (Harry's) own sleeve.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_48-17" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Post-mortem_and_legacy">Post-mortem and legacy</span></h3>
