He was removed from these posts during his conflict with the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a> under <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister</a> <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a> but was reinstated when the Ministry was forced to acknowledge that he had correctly warned that Voldemort had returned. He held the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_Merlin" title="Order of Merlin">Order of Merlin</a>, First Class, for Grand Sorcery.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Relationships">Relationships</span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Family">Family</span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Parents">Parents</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>Do not misunderstand me. I loved them. I loved my parents, I loved my brother and my sister, but I was selfish</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Albus Dumbledore<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 220px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9a/Percival_and_Kendra_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest?cb=20220801093425" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Percival and Kendra Dumbledore" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="220" height="171" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Percival and Kendra Dumbledore.png" data-image-key="Percival_and_Kendra_Dumbledore.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9a/Percival_and_Kendra_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/220?cb=20220801093425" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9a/Percival_and_Kendra_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest?cb=20220801093425" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Percival and Kendra Dumbledore" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9a/Percival_and_Kendra_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/220?cb=20220801093425" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="220" height="171" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Percival and Kendra Dumbledore.png" data-image-key="Percival_and_Kendra_Dumbledore.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9a/Percival_and_Kendra_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/220?cb=20220801093425" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Percival_and_Kendra_Dumbledore.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Percival and Kendra Dumbledore, his parents</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Albus's relationship with his parents was not very clear. However, it can be theorised that he most likely did not hold his <a href="/wiki/Percival_Dumbledore" title="Percival Dumbledore">father</a> in high regard, as he was imprisoned in <a href="/wiki/Azkaban" title="Azkaban">Azkaban</a> for magically attacking three <a href="/wiki/Non-magic_people" title="Non-magic people">Muggle</a> boys who had inflicted permanent psychological damage on Ariana. According to <a href="/wiki/Aberforth_Dumbledore" title="Aberforth Dumbledore">Aberforth</a>, their mother taught Albus secrecy. Given that she read stories to him, it can be assumed that Albus had a good relationship with her, or at least a better one than the one she had with Aberforth. Her death made Albus feel angry and bitter, as it left him with the responsibility of a damaged sister and a wayward brother, and he thought himself trapped and wasted.
</p><p>Later on, during his conversation with Harry in limbo, he confessed that he truly loved each and every one of his family but was blinded by his ambition and his madness. He had originally intended to use the <a href="/wiki/Resurrection_Stone" title="Resurrection Stone">Resurrection Stone</a> to bring back his parents, so that the heavy responsibility on his shoulders would be lifted. After Ariana's tragic and unexpected death, he planned, instead, to use the stone (if he ever found it, that is) to bring back his parents and his sister to apologise to them. This desire, however, ultimately caused his death: the Resurrection Stone had become part of a ring whose curse infected him the instant he put it on and slowly killed him.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ariana_Dumbledore">Ariana Dumbledore</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald - The Original Screenplay">"<i>Not as well as I should have done.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Albus Dumbledore to <a href="/wiki/Leta_Lestrange" title="Leta Lestrange">Leta Lestrange</a> when asked if he had loved Ariana.<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Fantastic_Beasts:_The_Crimes_of_Grindelwald_-_The_Original_Screenplay" title="Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald - The Original Screenplay">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 180px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0e/Ariana_Dumbledore_Hog%27s_Head.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20120108013927" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ariana Dumbledore Hog's Head" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="237" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Ariana Dumbledore Hog's Head.jpg" data-image-key="Ariana_Dumbledore_Hog%27s_Head.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0e/Ariana_Dumbledore_Hog%27s_Head.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20120108013927" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0e/Ariana_Dumbledore_Hog%27s_Head.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20120108013927" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ariana Dumbledore Hog's Head" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0e/Ariana_Dumbledore_Hog%27s_Head.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20120108013927" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="237" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Ariana Dumbledore Hog's Head.jpg" data-image-key="Ariana_Dumbledore_Hog%27s_Head.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0e/Ariana_Dumbledore_Hog%27s_Head.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20120108013927" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Ariana_Dumbledore_Hog%27s_Head.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Ariana_Dumbledore" title="Ariana Dumbledore">Ariana Dumbledore</a>, his younger sister</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Albus Dumbledore was Ariana Dumbledore's eldest brother and was not nearly as close to his younger siblings as they were to each other. Although he loved his younger sister, Albus was resentful when he had to take responsibility for her after their <a href="/wiki/Kendra_Dumbledore" title="Kendra Dumbledore">mother</a>'s death, which forced him to stay at home, and thus abandon his ambitious plans. When he and <a href="/wiki/Gellert_Grindelwald" title="Gellert Grindelwald">Gellert Grindelwald</a> made plans to subjugate <a href="/wiki/Non-magic_people" title="Non-magic people">Muggles</a> and take power in the <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_world" title="Wizarding world">wizarding world</a>, Albus planned to bring Ariana with them, but Aberforth pointed out that she was in no state to go. This launched a three-way duel between the brothers and Grindelwald, and Ariana was accidentally killed in the fray. Albus was devastated by his sister's death and for the rest of his life, Albus never forgave himself for the part he played in her death and always felt tremendous guilt and remorse over it. While he hardly ever spoke of this guilt to anyone, Dumbledore admitted it to <a href="/wiki/Leta_Lestrange" title="Leta Lestrange">Leta Lestrange</a> in an effort to get her to open up about her own guilt and admitted that he had not loved Ariana enough during her life. Dumbledore was also haunted with the fear that it had been him who cast the curse that killed Ariana, to the point that he delayed facing Grindelwald for years.<sup id="cite_ref-DH35_118-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH35-118"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>118<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>From then on, Albus's <a href="/wiki/Boggart" title="Boggart">Boggart</a> would be Ariana's corpse.<sup id="cite_ref-JKR_17-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-JKR-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Aberforth_Dumbledore">Aberforth Dumbledore</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>They were not alike: Aberforth was never bookish and, unlike Albus, preferred to settle arguments by <a href="/wiki/Duelling" title="Duelling">duelling</a> rather than through reasoned discussion... In fairness to Aberforth, it must be admitted that living in Albus's shadow cannot have been an altogether comfortable experience.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Description of the Dumbledore brothers<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 180px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/40/Aberforth_Dumbledore.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170911160033" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Aberforth Dumbledore" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="209" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Aberforth Dumbledore.jpg" data-image-key="Aberforth_Dumbledore.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/40/Aberforth_Dumbledore.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20170911160033" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/40/Aberforth_Dumbledore.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170911160033" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Aberforth Dumbledore" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/40/Aberforth_Dumbledore.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20170911160033" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="209" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Aberforth Dumbledore.jpg" data-image-key="Aberforth_Dumbledore.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/40/Aberforth_Dumbledore.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20170911160033" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Aberforth_Dumbledore.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Aberforth_Dumbledore" title="Aberforth Dumbledore">Aberforth Dumbledore</a>, his younger brother</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Aberforth Dumbledore was Albus's younger brother. Although Albus loved him, the two brothers were not close to each other, as they were very different persons in personality, with Aberforth resenting being in Albus's shadow. Despite not being close, it cannot be doubted that Albus loved and cared for him dearly, evidenced by the fact that even though he resented having to stay at home, Albus still refused to allow Aberforth to stop his education out of concern of his brother's future. While Albus likely alienated him, along with Ariana, during his obsession with Gellert Grindelwald, when Grindelwald attacked Aberforth, Albus immediately came to his brother's aid and fought against his lover, clearly displaying that even at the height of his worst years, Albus still cared for Aberforth's well-being immensely. After Ariana's death, Albus and Aberforth's relationship became very estranged, as Aberforth blamed Albus for the death of the sister he and his mother spent so much time caring for. Although they eventually established a cordial relationship with each other, with Aberforth joining the Order of Phoenix when Albus founded it and attending Albus's funeral, Aberforth and Albus still remained distant as Aberforth was not able to forgive Albus. Albus himself made no attempts to change his brother's opinion about him, apparently acknowledging that he deserved it and accepting it as his punishment for their tragic family past, which Albus had a hand in. However, Albus was nevertheless saddened that he and Aberforth never could reconcile, and he did have a strong desire to make peace with him, as whenever he looked into the Mirror of Erised later in his life, Albus would see himself and Aberforth reconciled, and all of his family returned to him. Albus also came to believe that Aberforth was a better person than he was due to his much greater devotion to Ariana, which <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> disagreed with. Aberforth himself however, eventually changed his opinions of his brother when Harry Potter helped him realise what Albus's intention really was and had forgiven him, as he chose to participate in the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>, helping the students and faculty of Hogwarts and the Hogsmeade residents to protect the school where Albus served as Headmaster for almost half of his lifetime, from Lord Voldemort, as well as to allow Harry time to find what he thought to be the last <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcrux</a>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Aurelius_Dumbledore">Aurelius Dumbledore</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore - The Complete Screenplay">"<i>What <a href="/wiki/Gellert_Grindelwald" title="Gellert Grindelwald">he</a>'s told you isn't true. But we do share the same blood. You are a Dumbledore. I'm sorry for your pain. We didn't know, I promise.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Dumbledore telling Credence of his ancestry<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Fantastic_Beasts:_The_Secrets_of_Dumbledore_-_The_Complete_Screenplay" title="Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore - The Complete Screenplay">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 200px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8a/Credence_Barebone_SODM.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20220714204702" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Credence Barebone SODM" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="200" height="228" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Credence Barebone SODM.jpeg" data-image-key="Credence_Barebone_SODM.jpeg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8a/Credence_Barebone_SODM.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20220714204702" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8a/Credence_Barebone_SODM.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20220714204702" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Credence Barebone SODM" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8a/Credence_Barebone_SODM.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20220714204702" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="200" height="228" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Credence Barebone SODM.jpeg" data-image-key="Credence_Barebone_SODM.jpeg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8a/Credence_Barebone_SODM.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20220714204702" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Credence_Barebone_SODM.jpeg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Aurelius_Dumbledore" title="Aurelius Dumbledore">Aurelius Dumbledore</a>, his nephew</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Aurelius was Albus's nephew through his brother Abeforth. Dumbledore first became aware about the rumours of his nephew during the summer he fell in love for the first and only time, when his brother also fell in love, with a girl from <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric's Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a>. The rumours were of a child, indeed Albus's nephew, but the girl was sent away, and Albus was unable to help his brother with his son due to Aberforth having never sought or confided in his elder brother for help. Aurlieus, the boy's name, was lost to them for more than thirty years until he was already an adult.<sup id="cite_ref-SODS66_123-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-SODS66-123"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>123<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>In 1927, Albus Dumbledore developed an interest in Credence, Aurelius' now adopted name, and worked with his former student, <a href="/wiki/Newton_Scamander" title="Newton Scamander">Newt Scamander</a>, twice in order to protect him from <a href="/wiki/Gellert_Grindelwald" title="Gellert Grindelwald">Gellert Grindelwald</a>. Though Albus was aware of the Obscurial, he was unaware it was a lost member of his family. Though Grindelwald claimed to Credence he was Aurelius Dumbledore, Albus's younger brother, this was also indeed not the factual truth. Later on, Credence agreed to help Grindelwald bypass the Dark Wizard's blood pact and kill Albus.<sup id="cite_ref-COG_37-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-COG-37"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>37<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> In <a href="/wiki/1932" title="1932">1932</a>, Dumbledore met his nephew in person for the first time on a <a href="/wiki/Berlin_street" title="Berlin street">street</a> in <a href="/wiki/Berlin" title="Berlin">Berlin</a>, and they had a conversation about Credence's abandonment, for he still believed Grindelwald's lie that he and Albus were brothers. At the beginning of a duel, <a href="/wiki/Credence_Barebone%27s_phoenix" class="mw-redirect" title="Credence Barebone's phoenix">Credence's phoenix</a> flew past Dumbledore and Credence told him that the phoenix was there for him, not Albus. Using his Obscurus powers, he tried to consume Albus but was rejected. He ran toward Dumbledore while his Obscurus followed, destroying the street. Dumbledore realised that Credence was really a Dumbledore - the son of Albus' brother <a href="/wiki/Aberforth_Dumbledore" title="Aberforth Dumbledore">Aberforth</a> and thus his nephew - after witnessing Credence's phoenix drop ashes on him. Expressing compassion for the young man's pain, confirming they indeed shared the same blood, and his promise that he didn't know about his existence, Dumbledore helped Credence up and the two parted ways without further conflict.<sup id="cite_ref-SODS47_124-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-SODS47-124"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>124<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Understanding the rumours to have been true, Dumbledore quickly informed his unknowing brother of his son and that the boy-like man needed his father (Aberforth's) help. Later, in <a href="/wiki/Bhutan" title="Bhutan">Bhutan</a>, Dumbledore helped Aberforth protect Credence from the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a> shot by Grindelwald. Afterwards, Dumbledore watched as the phoenix followed Credence and Aberforth home. Though happy for his brother and sympathetic to his nephew's pain, he was convinced that his nephew couldn't be saved due to his Obscurial nature poisoning him, meaning that young man only had limited time left despite Grindelwald's failure to kill him.<sup id="cite_ref-SODS95_125-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-SODS95-125"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>125<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Gellert_Grindelwald">Gellert Grindelwald</span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore - The Complete Screenplay">"<i>I went along, because? Because I was in love with you.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Albus Dumbledore to Gellert Grindelwald, why he almost went along <a href="/wiki/For_the_Greater_Good" title="For the Greater Good">for The Greater Good</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Fantastic_Beasts:_The_Secrets_of_Dumbledore_-_The_Complete_Screenplay" title="Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore - The Complete Screenplay">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 200px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a0/Gellert_Grindelwald_SODM_2.png/revision/latest?cb=20221002143459" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Gellert Grindelwald SODM 2" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="200" height="314" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Gellert Grindelwald SODM 2.png" data-image-key="Gellert_Grindelwald_SODM_2.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a0/Gellert_Grindelwald_SODM_2.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20221002143459" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a0/Gellert_Grindelwald_SODM_2.png/revision/latest?cb=20221002143459" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Gellert Grindelwald SODM 2" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a0/Gellert_Grindelwald_SODM_2.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20221002143459" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="200" height="314" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Gellert Grindelwald SODM 2.png" data-image-key="Gellert_Grindelwald_SODM_2.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a0/Gellert_Grindelwald_SODM_2.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20221002143459" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Gellert_Grindelwald_SODM_2.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Gellert_Grindelwald" title="Gellert Grindelwald">Gellert Grindelwald</a>, his former lover and great enemy</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Dumbledore first met Gellert Grindelwald when he was seventeen. They were introduced by Grindelwald's great aunt, <a href="/wiki/Bathilda_Bagshot" title="Bathilda Bagshot">Bathilda Bagshot</a>. They got along almost instantly, according to Bagshot. They were ultimately united by their desire to have the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a>. They also made a <a href="/wiki/Blood_pact" title="Blood pact">blood pact</a>, and they swore an oath never to fight each other. At one point they were romantically involved and had a very passionate relationship; so passionate that Dumbledore would, for a time, see Grindelwald in the Mirror of Erised as his greatest desire. 
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>Gellert — <br /> Your point about Wizard dominance being </i>For the <a href="/wiki/Non-magic_people" title="Non-magic people">Muggle</a>'s own good<i> — this, I think, is the crucial point. Yes, we have been given power and yes, that power gives us the right to rule, but it also gives us responsibilities over the ruled. We must stress this point, it will be the foundation stone upon which we build. Where we are opposed, as we surely will be, this must be the basis of all our counterarguments. We seize control </i><a href="/wiki/For_the_Greater_Good" title="For the Greater Good">for the greater good</a><i>. And from this it follows that where we meet resistance, we must use only the force that is necessary and no more. (This was your mistake at <a href="/wiki/Durmstrang_Institute" title="Durmstrang Institute">Durmstrang</a>! But I do not complain, because if you had not been expelled, we would never have met.)<br />Albus</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— One of Albus Dumbledore's letters to Grindelwald in their school years as they plotted Muggle domination<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>They were great friends and lovers for two months until Aberforth, Dumbledore's brother, confronted them over the neglect of Ariana Dumbledore. Grindelwald lost control during the argument and attacked Aberforth. Dumbledore rushed forward to defend his brother, and during the duel his sister, Ariana, was killed. Grindelwald fled and Dumbledore ended their friendship, although his romantic desires did not subside.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald - The Original Screenplay">"<i>Oh we were closer than brothers.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Albus Dumbledore to Torquil Travers, about his bond with Gellert Grindelwald<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Fantastic_Beasts:_The_Crimes_of_Grindelwald_-_The_Original_Screenplay" title="Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald - The Original Screenplay">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Dumbledore_Mirror_of_Erised.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190209142936" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Dumbledore Mirror of Erised" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="138" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Dumbledore Mirror of Erised.gif" data-image-key="Dumbledore_Mirror_of_Erised.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Dumbledore_Mirror_of_Erised.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190209142936" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Dumbledore_Mirror_of_Erised.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190209142936" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Dumbledore Mirror of Erised" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Dumbledore_Mirror_of_Erised.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190209142936" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="138" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Dumbledore Mirror of Erised.gif" data-image-key="Dumbledore_Mirror_of_Erised.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Dumbledore_Mirror_of_Erised.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190209142936" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Dumbledore_Mirror_of_Erised.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">For a long and tumultuous time in his life, Albus's greatest and most desperate desire was his former best friend and lover, Gellert Grindelwald</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Grindelwald spent a number of years gaining power in Europe while Dumbledore spent his time teaching young wizards at Hogwarts. While Grindelwald and his army terrorised Europe, Dumbledore remained in Britain and refused adamantly to face Grindelwald. While this was partially due to the Blood Pact, which also kept Britain safe as Grindelwald couldn't attempt an attack as it would mean a duel with Albus, which would violate the Pact, Dumbledore showed he still had lingering affection for Grindelwald, as when he looked at the Mirror of Erised at this time in his life, he saw Grindelwald. Nevertheless, Dumbledore tried to indirectly participate in Grindelwald's defeat, and he used Newt to do it by sending him to America with the injured Thunderbird Frank, knowing somehow Grindelwald had infiltrated America in search for the Obscurial there, which Dumbledore knew he intended to use against him. However, after the death of Leta Lestrange, Dumbledore put aside whatever affection he had for Grindelwald and was determined to break the Blood Pact.
</p><p>While not having the vial destroyed, he made sure that the wizarding world would survive Grindelwald's reign of terror by providing whatever intellectual and possibly magical assistance he could. After finally succeeding, Dumbledore directly tracked down Grindelwald. Upon finding each other, Dumbledore and Grindelwald initiated a legendary duel of 1945, unleashing all of their extraordinary magical capabilities on each other, the display being so amazing that it remains among the greatest magical battles ever in history. Dumbledore eventually triumphed in the end, despite Grindelwald's mastery of the <a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">Elder Wand</a>, becoming the wand's new master and he then brought in Grindelwald to the authorities of the magical world, who imprisoned him in his own prison <a href="/wiki/Nurmengard_Castle" title="Nurmengard Castle">Nurmengard</a>.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>Did I know, in my heart of hearts, what Gellert Grindelwald was? I think I did, but I closed my eyes.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Albus Dumbledore to Harry Potter, about his friendship with Gellert Grindelwald<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>Years later in <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>, Grindelwald refused to give any information to <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> about the Elder Wand despite the fact that he was imprisoned, wandless and face-to-face with the only Dark wizard ever considered greater and more powerful than himself. This seems to indicate that Grindelwald no longer held the views of those who practised the Dark Arts and had contemplated and felt remorse over his actions and that his lie was a last act to repent for his sins, something which Dumbledore acknowledged to be true, implying despite Grindelwald's crimes, Dumbledore still retained some fondness for him and believed that he truly had felt remorse over his crimes during his imprisonment in Nurmengard. It was speculated by <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> that Grindelwald had given his life to prevent Voldemort from desecrating Dumbledore's tomb, possibly indicating Grindelwald still respected and cared for Dumbledore despite all that happened.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Newt_Scamander">Newt Scamander</span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald - The Original Screenplay">"<i>Do you know why I admire you, Newt? More perhaps than any men I know. You do not seek power. Or popularity. You simply ask, is the thing right in itself? If it is, you do it, no matter the cost.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Albus Dumbledore to Newt when they met in <a href="/wiki/London" title="London">London</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Fantastic_Beasts:_The_Crimes_of_Grindelwald_-_The_Original_Screenplay" title="Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald - The Original Screenplay">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 180px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d4/Newton_Scamander_SODM.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20220715121658" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Newton Scamander SODM" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="239" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Newton Scamander SODM.jpeg" data-image-key="Newton_Scamander_SODM.jpeg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d4/Newton_Scamander_SODM.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20220715121658" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d4/Newton_Scamander_SODM.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20220715121658" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Newton Scamander SODM" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d4/Newton_Scamander_SODM.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20220715121658" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="239" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Newton Scamander SODM.jpeg" data-image-key="Newton_Scamander_SODM.jpeg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d4/Newton_Scamander_SODM.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20220715121658" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Newton_Scamander_SODM.jpeg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Newton_Scamander" title="Newton Scamander">Newt Scamander</a>, his former student and friend</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Dumbledore's relationship with the famous <a href="/wiki/Magizoologist" title="Magizoologist">magizoologist</a> was very close. During Newt's time at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>, Dumbledore was his <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> Professor. When one of <a href="/wiki/Leta_Lestrange" title="Leta Lestrange">Leta Lestrange</a>'s experiments involving a magical beast went too far, endangering the life of another student. Newt did not want to see a friend thrown out of school, so he took the blame for Leta's actions, and was thus sentenced to be expelled from Hogwarts in her place. Albus developed unending trust and loyalty to him after he argued strongly against his expulsion. It is unclear whether the expulsion was enforced or not, or if it was temporary or permanent. However, Newt was allowed to keep his wand. After school Newt probably was in regular contact with his teacher. Newt respected his mentor enough to do tasks for him. Dumbledore told him where to find one ill-bred <a href="/wiki/Thunderbird" title="Thunderbird">Thunderbird</a> and later sent his former student to <a href="/wiki/New_York" title="New York">New York</a> to release this beast, whose natural environment was <a href="/wiki/Arizona" title="Arizona">Arizona</a>. At this time Newt helped capture <a href="/wiki/Gellert_Grindelwald" title="Gellert Grindelwald">Gellert Grindelwald</a>, who was trying to convince <a href="/wiki/Obscurial" title="Obscurial">Obscurial</a> <a href="/wiki/Aurelius_Dumbledore" title="Aurelius Dumbledore">Credence Barebone</a> to join his ranks. Newt was extremely loyal to Dumbledore, because when he appealed to his travel ban, he lied to the committee members that he had gone to the <a href="/wiki/United_States_of_America" title="United States of America">United States</a> on his orders. When Grindelwald managed to escape, Albus felt that he would not be able to fight the Dark wizard, so he asked Scamander for help. Dumbledore admired him, because he didn't care about power or popularity, which is quite ironic as Dumbledore once craved at least one of these things. He sent Newt to <a href="/wiki/Paris" title="Paris">Paris</a> to rescue Credence, who survived battle in New York, but Newt was reluctant, nevertheless he was willing to accept the address of a <a href="/wiki/Nicolas_Flamel" title="Nicolas Flamel">safe-house</a>. The rumours of Newton's potential travel to <a href="/wiki/France" title="France">France</a> reached the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">British Ministry of Magic</a>, and a delegation, including Newt's brother <a href="/wiki/Theseus_Scamander" title="Theseus Scamander">Theseus Scamander</a>, Leta Lestrange and <a href="/wiki/Torquil_Travers" title="Torquil Travers">Torquil Travers</a>, was sent to Hogwarts Castle to question Dumbledore. Albus only pretended that he did not know anything about it and said that Newt was not a great follower of orders. During the <a href="/wiki/Gellert_Grindelwald%27s_Paris_rally" title="Gellert Grindelwald's Paris rally">Battle in Lestrange family Mausoleum</a>, a vial of Dumbledore's and Grindelwald's <a href="/wiki/Blood_pact" title="Blood pact">blood pact</a> was stolen from Grindelwald, however, without his knowledge by a <a href="/wiki/Niffler" title="Niffler">Niffler</a> belonging to Newt Scamander. Shortly thereafter, Scamander brought it to Dumbledore at Hogwarts. Dumbledore expressed regret at Leta's death in the mausoleum. Newt in turn did not ask Dumbledore why he would form a blood pact with Grindelwald but simply asked him to destroy it, showing respect for his privacy. Although it apparently took years, Dumbledore clearly managed to abolish the blood pact, allowing him to finally defeat Grindelwald in a legendary duel.
</p>
<h3><span id="Tom_Riddle_.28Lord_Voldemort.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Tom_Riddle_(Lord_Voldemort)">Tom Riddle (Lord Voldemort)</span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix"><b>Voldemort</b>: "<i>You do not seek to kill me, Dumbledore? Above such brutality, are you?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Dumbledore</b>: "<i>We both know there are other ways of destroying a man, Tom. Merely taking your life would not satisfy me, I admit.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Voldemort</b>: "<i>There is nothing worse than death, Dumbledore!</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Dumbledore</b>: "<i>You are quite wrong. Indeed your failure to understand that there are things much worse than death has always been your greatest weakness.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Lord Voldemort and Dumbledore during their <a href="/wiki/Duel_in_the_Ministry_Atrium" title="Duel in the Ministry Atrium">Duel in the Ministry Atrium</a>, as part of the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/Lord_Voldemort.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150829033655" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Lord Voldemort" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="310" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Lord Voldemort.jpg" data-image-key="Lord_Voldemort.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/Lord_Voldemort.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150829033655" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/Lord_Voldemort.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150829033655" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Lord Voldemort" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/Lord_Voldemort.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150829033655" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="310" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Lord Voldemort.jpg" data-image-key="Lord_Voldemort.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/Lord_Voldemort.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150829033655" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Lord_Voldemort.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a>, his former student and greatest enemy</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Dumbledore personally approached <a href="/wiki/Cole" title="Cole">Mrs Cole</a>, the caretaker of the orphanage in which <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Tom Riddle</a> resided to enrol the latter in Hogwarts. Dumbledore met Tom Riddle for the first time there and was unaware at the time that he had just met the person who would become the most powerful and dangerous Dark wizard of all time. He was however intrigued by Tom Riddle as his powers were surprisingly well-developed by such a young wizard who had begun to use them consciously. Dumbledore was also disturbed by the fact that Tom was a <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parselmouth</a>, a rare ability supposedly connected with the Dark Arts, although not as much as the fact that Tom had obvious instincts for cruelty, secrecy and domination which was proved by the fact that Tom had used his magic to hurt the other children in the orphanage. Dumbledore then returned to Hogwarts intending to keep an eye upon Tom Riddle, as he was alone and friendless, a dangerous situation, but at that point Dumbledore, ever the man who staunchly believed in second chances and redemption, still considered Riddle as being not a lost cause and could repent.
</p><p>When then-headmaster <a href="/wiki/Armando_Dippet" title="Armando Dippet">Armando Dippet</a> confided in Dumbledore about Tom Riddle approaching him about staying on after graduation to teach <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> — which he only refused due to Tom's age, suggesting he ask again in a few years — Dumbledore advised him against it. Though he explained none of his reasons to Professor Dippet, for the headmaster was just as charmed by Tom as the other professors, Dumbledore felt uneasy about the request and did not want Riddle back at Hogwarts in a position of power and influence over impressionable young minds.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>The time is long gone when I could frighten you with a burning wardrobe and force you to make repayment for your crimes. But I wish I could, Tom, I wish I could...</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Albus Dumbledore<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8d/Tom_and_Dumbledore.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20081012184300" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Tom and Dumbledore" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Tom and Dumbledore.jpg" data-image-key="Tom_and_Dumbledore.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8d/Tom_and_Dumbledore.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20081012184300" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8d/Tom_and_Dumbledore.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20081012184300" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Tom and Dumbledore" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8d/Tom_and_Dumbledore.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20081012184300" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Tom and Dumbledore.jpg" data-image-key="Tom_and_Dumbledore.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8d/Tom_and_Dumbledore.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20081012184300" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tom_and_Dumbledore.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Tom Riddle and Dumbledore</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>While Dumbledore was aware of <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Tom Riddle</a>'s transformation and rise to power, he still maintained contact with the latter, even allowing him to visit <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">the school</a> for a supposed job interview. When Tom, or Lord Voldemort as he began calling himself, visited the school, Dumbledore was courteous. However, Dumbledore suspected that Voldemort wanted more than a job, likely wanting to raise an army. He was troubled at some of the rumours about Tom, these were true of course. When Dumbledore turned down Voldemort's request, this sealed the deep resentment Voldemort would continue to feel towards him and he cursed the Defence Against the Dark Arts post out of spite.
</p><p>It was clear that while many who followed Dumbledore's cause both feared and despised Voldemort greatly, Dumbledore did not share such views as he had known Tom Riddle personally, and although he was committed to defeating him, Dumbledore held no personal resentment nor fear towards the Dark Lord and continued to see him as his former student worthy of being pitied for his childhood and complete inability to understand love, as he had never received any. He even appeared to feel some deep-rooted guilt and remorse over his inability to change Riddle, as he noted with great sadness in his face and tone that he sincerely wished he could have forced Voldemort to repent for his sins in a peaceful manner. Dumbledore understood the evil in Riddle as a result of a string of unfortunate events and performed intensive research on him, eventually discovering his Horcruxes. After Riddle's transformation into Lord Voldemort, contrary to the rest of the wizarding community's fear of saying the Dark Lord's name, Dumbledore, as the only person Voldemort (secretly) feared, refused to be intimidated by the Dark Lord, referring to him as "Voldemort" to others and as "Tom" in conversation with Voldemort himself, a subtle but steadfast refusal to allow Lord Voldemort to dictate the terms of their relationship and a trait that would later be inherited by Harry Potter. Riddle, for his part, held Dumbledore in open contempt, hatred and disdain as "<i>a Muggle-loving fool</i>" and believer in the power of love but nevertheless feared him and never actively sought a battle with him even with the protection of his Horcruxes, showing that he acknowledged (on an inner level) Dumbledore as a powerful and deadly wizard.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Movie-duel.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170103051228" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Movie-duel" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Movie-duel.jpg" data-image-key="Movie-duel.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Movie-duel.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170103051228" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Movie-duel.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170103051228" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Movie-duel" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Movie-duel.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170103051228" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Movie-duel.jpg" data-image-key="Movie-duel.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Movie-duel.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170103051228" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Movie-duel.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Albus Dumbledore locked in combat with <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In <a href="/wiki/1996" title="1996">1996</a>, Dumbledore and Voldemort met face to face in the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a>. Voldemort started a dangerous <a href="/wiki/Duelling" title="Duelling">duel</a> during which he used all of his tremendous magical capabilities in an attempt to murder Harry Potter along with his former teacher. Fortunately for Dumbledore, he proved himself to be worthy of his title as the only wizard who was ever feared by Voldemort and maintained the offensive in the battle, eventually forcing Voldemort to flee. A short while later, Dumbledore became aware of Voldemort's plan to use <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> to kill him, possibly as Voldemort realised from their previous altercation that he would lose a duel with Dumbledore head on and thus used Dumbledore's empathy for Draco to give Draco a greater chance to kill him. Dumbledore requested to <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Snape</a> that he should be the one to kill him instead of Malfoy. Despite dying to Snape in <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>, Dumbledore's legacy allowed Harry Potter to defeat Voldemort once and for all in <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Patricia_Rakepick">Patricia Rakepick</span></h3>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 180px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/Patricia_Rakepick_-_Hogwarts_Mystery.png/revision/latest?cb=20201214120904" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Patricia Rakepick - Hogwarts Mystery" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="276" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Patricia Rakepick - Hogwarts Mystery.png" data-image-key="Patricia_Rakepick_-_Hogwarts_Mystery.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/Patricia_Rakepick_-_Hogwarts_Mystery.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20201214120904" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/Patricia_Rakepick_-_Hogwarts_Mystery.png/revision/latest?cb=20201214120904" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Patricia Rakepick - Hogwarts Mystery" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/Patricia_Rakepick_-_Hogwarts_Mystery.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20201214120904" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="276" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Patricia Rakepick - Hogwarts Mystery.png" data-image-key="Patricia_Rakepick_-_Hogwarts_Mystery.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/Patricia_Rakepick_-_Hogwarts_Mystery.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20201214120904" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Patricia_Rakepick_-_Hogwarts_Mystery.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Patricia_Rakepick" title="Patricia Rakepick">Patricia Rakepick</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Albus Dumbledore was, at the time of <a href="/wiki/Patricia_Rakepick" title="Patricia Rakepick">Patricia Rakepick</a>'s arrival at Hogwarts, the school's <a href="/wiki/Head_of_Transfiguration" title="Head of Transfiguration">Head of Transfiguration</a> under then <a href="/wiki/Headteacher" title="Headteacher">Headmaster</a> <a href="/wiki/Armando_Dippet" title="Armando Dippet">Armando Dippet</a>, until he eventually succeeded the latter in said post at some point during her magical education. Unlike all of the other staff members, Dumbledore did not let her rebellious streak, a trait for which, seen as it went beyond mere mischief-making, many of his colleagues came to distrust and dislike her for, cloud the fact that she was an exceptional student and spoke highly of her abilities even after her graduation. He welcomed her warmly back to Hogwarts upon inviting her back to the castle to help the staff in their efforts to put a stop to the threat posed to the security of the school and those who dwelled therein by the fabled <a href="/wiki/Cursed_Vaults" title="Cursed Vaults">Cursed Vaults</a>, though it is unknown if he shared <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a>'s suspicions about her ulterior motives, the latter of whom believed, quite correctly, that Dumbledore trusted her.
</p><p>After Rakepick revealed herself to be a traitor working for <a href="/wiki/R" title="R">R</a>, Dumbledore did not seem too surprised, showing that he did suspect her but just didn't take it to extreme levels. Regardless, Dumbledore didn't seem to resent her too much for having ruthlessly tortured <a href="/wiki/Merula_Snyde" title="Merula Snyde">Merula Snyde</a>, as although he considered it a major priority to neutralise her, Dumbledore openly suggested against <a href="/wiki/Merula_Snyde" title="Merula Snyde">Merula Snyde</a> being too focused to kill her.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Harry_Potter">Harry Potter</span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">"<i>I cared about you too much. I cared more for your happiness than your knowing the truth, more for your peace of mind than my plan, more for your life than the lives that might be lost if the plan failed. In other words, I acted exactly as Voldemort expects we fools who love to act.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Dumbledore explaining his feelings for Harry<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 180px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3a/Harry_Potter_HBPF_promo_2.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20221213132921" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry Potter HBPF promo 2" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="238" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Potter HBPF promo 2.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_HBPF_promo_2.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3a/Harry_Potter_HBPF_promo_2.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20221213132921" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3a/Harry_Potter_HBPF_promo_2.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20221213132921" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry Potter HBPF promo 2" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3a/Harry_Potter_HBPF_promo_2.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20221213132921" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="238" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Potter HBPF promo 2.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_HBPF_promo_2.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3a/Harry_Potter_HBPF_promo_2.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20221213132921" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Potter_HBPF_promo_2.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a>, his favourite student and protégé</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Dumbledore was well known for the care and steadfast championing of Harry Potter. It was Dumbledore who planned and wanted the infant Harry to be taken from the cottage at <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric's Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a> where Harry's parents had been murdered, taking him away from his godfather and rightful guardian. He then left Harry in the care of Harry's <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">Aunt Petunia</a> and <a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">Uncle Vernon</a> in Surrey, Little Whinging, placing Harry on the doorstep of their home, despite them not being named guardians in the event of James and Lily's death. Despite being aware of the criminal abuse Harry had suffered while living with the Dursley family through a contact, <a href="/wiki/Arabella_Figg" title="Arabella Figg">Arabella Figg</a>, he did not step in to prevent the abuse Harry suffered as a child, leaving him to suffer with his magical hating Aunt and Uncle and bullying cousin <a href="/wiki/Dudley" title="Dudley">Dudley</a>. Throughout Harry's years at Hogwarts, Dumbledore provided him with protection and guidance, and supplemented Harry's schooling with additional information about Lord Voldemort.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>You are protected, in short, by your ability to love! The only protection that can possibly work against the lure of power like Voldemort's! In spite of all the temptation you have endured, all the suffering, you remain pure of heart, just as pure as you were at the age of eleven, when you stared into a mirror that reflected your heart's desire, and it showed you only the way to thwart Lord Voldemort, and not immortality or riches. Harry, have you any idea how few wizards could have seen what you saw in that mirror? Voldemort should have known then what he was dealing with, but he did not!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Dumbledore telling Harry about his uncommon nature as a wizard<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>After the <a href="/wiki/Return_of_Lord_Voldemort" title="Return of Lord Voldemort">Rebirth of Lord Voldemort</a>, Dumbledore, in an effort to prevent Voldemort from learning certain details through his link to Harry, refused to disclose certain details to Harry. This caused some friction between the two. Soon after Sirius' death Dumbledore attempted to comfort and explain himself to the distraught Harry, who took his anger out by demolishing Dumbledore's office, even going so far as to consider attacking him. When Dumbledore explained to Harry that he had done so because he cared a great deal for him and wished to avoid Voldemort learning the true nature of their relationship, Harry was still angry but was more understanding.
</p><p>By <a href="/wiki/1996%E2%80%931997_school_year" title="1996–1997 school year">Harry's sixth year</a>, Albus Dumbledore took on the role of providing Harry with additional insights into the origins of <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>, as Voldemort's power was growing enormously stronger. He did this largely through the use of the <a href="/wiki/Pensieve" title="Pensieve">Pensieve</a>. He entrusted Harry with the task of getting a final, crucial memory from <a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Horace Slughorn</a> regarding Voldemort's knowledge of <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>. 
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>He accused me of being "Dumbledore's man through and through".</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Albus Dumbledore</b>: "<i>How very rude.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>I told him I was.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Harry talking to Dumbledore<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>When Dumbledore was killed, Harry was devastated.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>You are talented, famous, and powerful — everything Horace values.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Albus Dumbledore's opinion of Harry Potter<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fb/Harry_Dumbledore_limbo.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220457" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry Dumbledore limbo" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="187" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Dumbledore limbo.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Dumbledore_limbo.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fb/Harry_Dumbledore_limbo.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141122220457" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fb/Harry_Dumbledore_limbo.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220457" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry Dumbledore limbo" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fb/Harry_Dumbledore_limbo.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141122220457" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="187" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Dumbledore limbo.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Dumbledore_limbo.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fb/Harry_Dumbledore_limbo.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141122220457" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Dumbledore_limbo.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry Potter speaking with Albus Dumbledore in Limbo</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry and Dumbledore forged a strong Student <i>—</i> Headmaster bond, comparable to that between two close family members (most likely the case of a great-grandfather <i>—</i> grandson), in spite of the century in age difference. Harry felt comfortable enough around the impressive, intimidating figure of Dumbledore to shout at him in frustration, cry out of grief, admit to his fears, and entrust him with his life. Dumbledore in return considered Harry to be a talented and powerful <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">wizard</a> who had inherited his parents' best qualities, noting that Harry was a leader of superior quality to himself, as Harry led because others looked to him to lead them rather than because he had ever sought power or authority for himself. He also had great faith in Harry as shown when Dumbledore was in a weakened state and Harry, who had never Apparated beyond a few feet, had to <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Apparate</a> them both back. Dumbledore told Harry that he wasn't worried because he was with Harry.
</p><p>After Dumbledore's death, Harry decided to continue the impossibly difficult task Dumbledore had left him of finding and destroying each of Voldemort's Horcruxes. However Harry had difficulty coping with the fact that there was much Dumbledore had not told him, about his history with the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a> and <a href="/wiki/Gellert_Grindelwald" title="Gellert Grindelwald">Gellert Grindelwald</a>: even doubting that Dumbledore even cared about him, beginning to believe the old Headmaster simply thought of Harry as nothing more than a tool to be used. Something Harry thought was proven true when he learned during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a> that Dumbledore had supposedly planned all along for Harry to sacrifice himself.
</p><p>Before the final event of the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>, after Harry sacrificed himself and was struck by Voldemort's Killing Curse and nearly died back in the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a>, his soul went to a <a href="/wiki/Limbo" title="Limbo">place</a> resembling <a href="/wiki/King%27s_Cross_Station" title="King's Cross Station">King's Cross Station</a>, where Dumbledore was waiting to speak with him. The fact that Dumbledore himself was there to meet Harry in a place between life and death attests to the bond of fellowship between them, not to mention Dumbledore had been waiting nearly a year for Harry in limbo. Dumbledore proceeded to tie up the loose ends with Harry, explaining everything he withheld whilst he was alive. At one point, Dumbledore seemed to beg for Harry's reassurance, uncharacteristically doubting some of the decisions he had made in the course of his life, which Harry easily gave him. He even pleaded with Harry to forgive him for the mistakes he's made, acknowledging Harry as the better man. Though Harry had felt some resentment for how little he felt Dumbledore had actually revealed of himself in their time together, Dumbledore showed a side of himself that no one had ever seen to Harry. Afterwards, the two part ways on good terms, as Harry returned to the living world to defeat Voldemort for good, while Dumbledore went "on" to the afterlife. After the war, Harry also named his <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">second son</a> after his old mentor.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Rubeus_Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">"<i>I would trust Hagrid with my life.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Albus Dumbledore's trust in Hagrid<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 180px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Rubeus_Hagrid.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160121163026" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Rubeus Hagrid" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="247" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Rubeus Hagrid.jpg" data-image-key="Rubeus_Hagrid.jpg" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Rubeus_Hagrid.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20160121163026" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Rubeus_Hagrid.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160121163026" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Rubeus Hagrid" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Rubeus_Hagrid.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20160121163026" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="247" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Rubeus Hagrid.jpg" data-image-key="Rubeus_Hagrid.jpg" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Rubeus_Hagrid.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20160121163026" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Rubeus_Hagrid.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a>: his friend, colleague, and former student</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Dumbledore displayed an innate trust of Rubeus Hagrid in every situation starting from when Hagrid attended Hogwarts. Dumbledore believed that Hagrid did not open the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a> and asked the former Headmaster <a href="/wiki/Armando_Dippet" title="Armando Dippet">Armando Dippet</a> to train Hagrid as the gamekeeper so he could stay. Since that time Dumbledore has shown many examples of his faith in Hagrid. For example, Hagrid is the one tasked to protect <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> as he is brought to live with the Dursleys, in addition he is asked to bring the <a href="/wiki/Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Philosopher's Stone">Philosopher's Stone</a> back from Gringotts. Dumbledore also sent Hagrid on other important missions, such as attempting to persuade the <a href="/wiki/Giant" title="Giant">giants</a> to join the side of the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a>. Dumbledore additionally was the only one who supported Hagrid's decision to bring his giant half-brother <a href="/wiki/Grawp" title="Grawp">Grawp</a> with him back to Hogwarts after his mission to recruit the giants failed, allowing Grawp to stay in the Forbidden Forest and later having him sent to the mountains near Hogsmeade. Hagrid was also devastated by Dumbledore's death in 1997. He was also right about telling Harry that Snape was on Dumbledore's side. Hagrid in return greatly admired and trusted Dumbledore and took extreme offence to anyone who dared insult the Headmaster.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Minerva_McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone"><b>Minerva McGonagall</b>: "<i>Professor Dumbledore is a very great wizard, Potter, he has many demands on his time —</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>But this is important.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Minerva McGonagall regarding Dumbledore's feelings towards Harry<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 180px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/84/Mcgonagall.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150810172040" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Mcgonagall" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="255" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Mcgonagall.jpg" data-image-key="Mcgonagall.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/84/Mcgonagall.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20150810172040" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/84/Mcgonagall.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150810172040" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Mcgonagall" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/84/Mcgonagall.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20150810172040" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="255" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Mcgonagall.jpg" data-image-key="Mcgonagall.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/84/Mcgonagall.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20150810172040" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Mcgonagall.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</a>: his friend, colleague, and former student</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Minerva McGonagall knew Dumbledore for the majority of her life. She attended <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a> as a student during Dumbledore's time as the <a href="/wiki/Transfiguration_(class)" title="Transfiguration (class)">Transfiguration</a> <a href="/wiki/Professor" title="Professor">Professor</a> and later went on to replace him when he took the position of <a href="/wiki/Headteacher" title="Headteacher">Head</a> of the school. She served for many years as his Deputy Headmistress, standing in for him and even replacing him as standing Headmistress on several occasions.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_48-24" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-COS_49-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-COS-49"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>49<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Minerva had great faith in Dumbledore, placing great stock in the differences between him and <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_8-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-8"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>8<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> However, she did not hesitate to disagree with him when she felt the need to do so. She was extremely opposed to his decision to place <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> with his narrow-minded <a href="/wiki/Non-magic_people" title="Non-magic people">Muggle</a> <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">aunt</a> and <a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">uncle</a>, saying that "<i>You couldn't find two people who are less like us</i>."<sup id="cite_ref-PS1_10-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS1-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She also served more than once to bring Dumbledore back on track when he became distracted from the matter currently at hand.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_59-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-59"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>59<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Dumbledore discovered Minerva in tears in her classroom late one evening, after she found out about the marriage of a <a href="/wiki/Dougal_McGregor" title="Dougal McGregor">young love</a> to another woman. She confessed the whole story to him and Albus Dumbledore offered both comfort and wisdom, telling Minerva some of his own family history, previously unknown to her. The confidences exchanged that night between two intensely private and reserved characters were to form the basis of a lasting mutual esteem and friendship.
</p><p>Minerva had no qualms about displaying her loyalty to Dumbledore. When <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a> brought <a href="/wiki/Auror" title="Auror">Aurors</a> to arrest Dumbledore in <a href="/wiki/1996" title="1996">1996</a>, she boldly stepped forward and announced her intention to fight the Aurors on his behalf. She only stepped back at Dumbledore's insistence when he reminded her that Hogwarts and her students would need her in his absence.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_64-21" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-64"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>64<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Minerva was devastated when Dumbledore was killed in <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a> during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Astronomy_Tower" title="Battle of the Astronomy Tower">Battle of the Astronomy Tower</a> and attended his funeral.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_48-25" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> A year later, when <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> returned to Hogwarts on a mission given to him by Dumbledore, she did not question the decision of her dead friend, but immediately sought to provide whatever assistance she could.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_28-15" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-28"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>28<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Severus_Snape">Severus Snape</span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Albus Dumbledore</b>: "<i>I prefer not to put all my secrets in one basket, particularly not a basket that spends so much time dangling on the arm of Lord Voldemort.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Severus Snape</b>: "<i>Which I do on your orders!</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Albus Dumbledore</b>: "<i>And you do it extremely well. Do not think that I underestimate the constant danger in which you place yourself, Severus. To give Voldemort what appears to be valuable information while withholding the essentials is a job I would entrust to nobody but you.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Dumbledore and Snape on the latter's espionage<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 180px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/35/Severus_Snape_OOTP.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220746" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Severus Snape OOTP" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="245" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Severus Snape OOTP.jpg" data-image-key="Severus_Snape_OOTP.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/35/Severus_Snape_OOTP.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20141122220746" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/35/Severus_Snape_OOTP.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220746" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Severus Snape OOTP" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/35/Severus_Snape_OOTP.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20141122220746" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="245" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Severus Snape OOTP.jpg" data-image-key="Severus_Snape_OOTP.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/35/Severus_Snape_OOTP.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20141122220746" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Severus_Snape_OOTP.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a>, a trusted ally, colleague, and former student</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Snape's relationship with Dumbledore was one of trust.
